item.title: US Treasury Yields Rise After Soft Demand for 10-Year Note Auction
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Long-dated Treasury yields rose after an auction of 10-year notes drew weak demand and traders shifted their focus to the sale of 30-year bonds Thursday. The benchmark 10-year yield were up about two basis point to 4.23% Wednesday afternoon, while shorter-dated tenors edged lower. The...
